mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM board b LEFT JOIN product p ON b.brd_id = p.brd_id WHERE b.cate_main = 1 AND b.brd_id > 0
AND b.cate_sub = #{cateSub}
AND
title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by b.brd_id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, ofile, sfile, cate_main, cate_sub) VALUES(#{title}, #{content}, #{ofile}, #{sfile}, 1, #{cateSub})
INSERT INTO product(price, status, deal_address, prd_type, brd_id) SELECT #{price}, '거래중', #{dealAddress}, #{prdType}, brd_id FROM board ORDER BY brd_id DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.select:
SELECT b.*, p.* FROM board b LEFT JOIN product p ON b.brd_id = p.brd_id WHERE b.cate_main = 1 AND b.brd_id > 0
AND b.cate_sub = #{cateSub}
AND
title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
order by b.brd_id desc LIMIT #{start}, 10
